item.title: Analysis: OTC Platforms and Market Makers Show Stronger Demand for ETH than BTC; ETH May Continue to Outperform BTC in the Future
item.description: On August 23rd, following Federal Reserve Chairman Powell's dovish signal at the Jackson Hole Economic Symposium, which went against market expectations of a tougher stance, cryptocurrencies witnessed a surge on Friday night. Consequently, asset managers anticipate that Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and certain altcoins will reach new highs.Analysts from Monarq Asset Management project that the price of Ethereum will ascend to above $5,000 in the forthcoming days. Sam Gaer, the Chief Investment Officer of the Monarq Direction Fund, informed CoinDesk, "We maintain an overall bullish outlook. The market's internal structure remains in good health with little indication of overheating. As you mentioned, the path to new highs for BTC and ETH is quite evident."Gaer stated that over-the-counter desks and market makers have a greater demand for ETH compared to BTC, suggesting that Ethereum may outperform Bitcoin in the future. Nevertheless, BTC itself is also demonstrating strong impetus

item.title: A certain Bitcoin ancient whale has once again moved 2520 BTC to ETH, now holding a total of over 153,000 ETH.
item.description: On August 23rd, as monitored by Onchain Lens, within the past 6 hours, a particular Bitcoin ancient whale deposited 2,520 BTC into HyperLiquid. The value of these BTC is $291.75 million, and they are intended for selling and exchanging into ETH. This OG currently holds 153,320 ETH, with a value of $724.1 million.

item.title: Analysis: WLFI's pre-market price reached a peak FDV of $55 billion, equivalent to the total FDV of LINK, UNI, ENA, and ONDO.
item.description: On August 23rd, according to the analysis of on-chain analyst AI Auntie @ai_9684xtpa, the highest price of WLFI at the opening of the Binance pre-market contract was $0.55, corresponding to a Fully Diluted Valuation (FDV) of $55 billion. This data is equivalent to the sum of the FDVs of four projects: LINK, UNI, ENA, and ONDO.At the time of this writing, the pre-market contract price of WLFI has dropped to $0.3771.

item.title: XDOG Surges Over 90% in 24 Hours, Market Cap Reaches $12.5 Million
item.description: On August 23rd, based on GMGN data, the X Layer on-chain Meme coin XDOG witnessed a surge of over 90% in the past 24 hours. Its market value rebounded to $12.5 million.BlockBeats alerts users that Meme coin prices are highly volatile. It is necessary to be cautious about asset protection and avoid the FOMO (Fear of Missing Out) phenomenon.

item.title: Musk: Cautiously Optimistic About Starship's Full Reusability Next Year
item.description: On August 23rd, SpaceX CEO Musk stated that constructing a fully reusable orbital rocket is one of the most challenging engineering issues that humanity has faced to date. It is even more difficult than going to the moon, which is why it has not been achieved yet. He is cautiously optimistic that Starship will achieve full reusability next year. Another crucial technology is orbital refueling, which is relatively simpler. If they are fortunate, it may also be achieved next year. By then, human consciousness and life will be able to expand to other planets and even stars.

item.title: Ethereum briefly dropped below $4,700, now rebounded to $4,723
item.description: On August 23rd, according to HTX market data, Ethereum briefly fell below $4,700. It is now rebounding to $4,723, with a 24-hour change of 8.82%.

item.title: This week, the U.S. Ethereum Spot ETF saw a net outflow of $241 million.
item.description: On August 23rd, as monitored by Farside Investors, this week, the US Ethereum spot ETF witnessed a net outflow of $241 million. The details include:BlackRock ETHA: -$8.3 millionFidelity FETH: -$79.7 millionBitwise ETHW: +$2.9 millionVanEck ETHV: -$1.6 millionJP Morgan QETH: -$7.4 millionFranklin Templeton EZET: -$7.4 millionGrayscale ETHE: -$88.9 millionGrayscale Ethereum Trust: -$50.4 million

item.title: A Whale Address Longed XPL 3x, Profiting $1.946 Million in Just 1 Day
item.description: On August 23rd, according to on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), the address 0x006...2a78F took a long position on XPL with a leverage of 3x. In just one day, they have already achieved a profit of $1.946 million and are currently holding 24,544,197 XPL (approximately $14.19 million). The entry price was $0.5009, and the liquidation price was $0.1789.

item.title: WLFI hit $0.55 on Binance Pre-market Contract Opening and has now retreated to $0.42.
item.description: On August 23rd, based on market data, WLFI has been launched on Binance Futures trading. The opening price reached $0.55 and is now withdrawing to $0.42.

item.title: Binance to Launch WLFI Perpetual Futures Trading in USDT-Margined Pre-market Trading
item.description: August 23rd. As per official information, Binance Futures is set to commence WLFIUSDT perpetual contract trading at 16:30 on August 23rd, 2025 (Beijing time), with a maximum leverage of 5 times.
